Plot: In order to take down a major criminal organization, the ambitious head of the internal affairs unit of the Reykjavik P.D. decides to investigate a corrupt police lieutenant. Tipped off ...
Title: Brave Men's Blood
Writer: Olaf de Fleur Johannesson, Hrafnkell Stefansson, Hrafnkell Stefansson
